mapper.select: select outt.id,orderId,product.name as productName,customer.name as customerName,productNum,createdDate,lastModifyDate,outt.info,price from outt,product,customer where orderId like "%"#{key}"%" and product.Id = outt.productId and outt.customerId=customer.id order by outt.id limit #{start},#{num}
select count(id) from outt where orderId like "%"#{key}"%"
